@graph.rdfs:label: Systematic review of inference, prediction, interpretation, and application methods on Biomedical Knowledge Graphs (BKGs)
Collection of Biomedical Knowledge Graphs used/reviewed (Hetionet, PrimeKG, PharmKG, GenomicKB, SDKG-11, KGHC, PubMedKG, DRAGON, TxGNN, etc.)
Biomedical literature corpus (PubMed abstracts, full-text articles, clinical notes, EMRs) used as source data for BKG construction and evaluation
Knowledge Graph Embedding models (TransE, TransH, TransR, RESCAL, DistMult, ComplEx, etc.) used for link prediction and embedding-based inference on BKGs
Graph Neural Network models (GCN, TxGNN, etc.) applied to BKGs for node/relation prediction and multi-hop reasoning
Large Language Models (GPT-series, LLaMA, etc.) integrated with BKGs for assisted interpretation, graph-to-text generation, RAG, and query understanding
Rule-based and path-based reasoning systems (AMIE, PoLo, XG4Repo, random walks, meta-path methods) used for logical inference and explanation on BKGs
